verses.verse: וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֛ק <S%H2388><s%> was strengthened שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מַלְכוּת֑וֹ <S%H4438><s%> in his kingdom וַיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <S%H430><s%> his God עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וַֽיְגַדְּלֵ֖הוּ <S%H1431><s%> [was] with him and magnified לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> him exceedingly

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel לְשָׂרֵי֩ <S%H8269><s%> to the captains הָאֲלָפִ֨ים <S%H505><s%> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֜וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and of hundreds וְלַשֹּֽׁפְטִ֗ים <S%H8199><s%> and to the judges וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> every נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> and to every governor לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in all Israel רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> the chief הָאָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers

וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> So Solomon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לַבָּמָ֖ה <S%H1116><s%> to the high place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגִבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> that [was] at Gibeon כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> was there הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> for there was the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> had made מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

אֲבָ֗ל <S%H61><s%> But אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God הֶעֱלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> brought up דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> had David מִקִּרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <S%H7157><s%> from Kirjathjearim בַּֽהֵכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> had prepared ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> to [the place which] David כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for נָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> for it for he had pitched ל֛וֹ אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> a tent בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> for it at Jerusalem

וּמִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> Moreover the brasen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> had made בְּצַלְאֵל֙ <S%H1212><s%> that Bezaleel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אוּרִ֣י <S%H221><s%> of Uri בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ח֔וּר <S%H2354><s%> of Hur שָׂ֕ם <S%H7760><s%> he put לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּדְרְשֵׁ֥הוּ <S%H1875><s%> sought שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon וְהַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> and the congregation

וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> went up שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> thither to the brasen לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> which [was] at the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> a thousand

בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> In that night הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> appear אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> did God לִשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֔וֹ שְׁאַ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> unto him Ask מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> what I shall give לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> You עָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Thou hast shewed עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great וְהִמְלַכְתַּ֖נִי <S%H4427><s%> and hast made me to reign תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God יֵֽאָמֵן֙ <S%H539><s%> be established דְּבָ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1697><s%> let thy promise עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> You הִמְלַכְתַּ֔נִי <S%H4427><s%> for thou hast made me king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> over a people רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> in multitude כַּעֲפַ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> like the dust הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now חָכְמָ֤ה <S%H2451><s%> me now wisdom וּמַדָּע֙ <S%H4093><s%> and knowledge תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לִ֔י וְאֵֽצְאָ֛ה <S%H3318><s%> that I may go out לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאָב֑וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> and come in כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יִשְׁפֹּ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> for who can judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֥ <S%H5971><s%> this thy people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> great ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֣ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God לִשְׁלֹמֹ֡ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> had זֹ֜את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָבֶ֗ךָ <S%H3824><s%> Because this was in thine heart וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁ֠אַלְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> and thou hast not asked עֹ֣שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches נְכָסִ֤ים <S%H5233><s%> wealth וְכָבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> or honour וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> nor the life שֹׂנְאֶ֔יךָ <S%H8130><s%> of thine enemies וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> life רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> long לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁאָ֑לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> neither yet hast asked וַתִּֽשְׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> but hast asked לְךָ֙ חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּמַדָּ֔ע <S%H4093><s%> and knowledge אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom תִּשְׁפּוֹט֙ <S%H8199><s%> for thyself that thou mayest judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִמְלַכְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H4427><s%> over whom I have made thee king עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

הַֽחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> Wisdom וְהַמַּדָּ֖ע <S%H4093><s%> and knowledge נָת֣וּן <S%H5414><s%> [is] granted לָ֑ךְ וְעֹ֨שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> thee riches וּנְכָסִ֤ים <S%H5233><s%> and wealth וְכָבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> and honour אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> unto thee and I will give לָ֔ךְ אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> none הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> become כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לַמְּלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> such as none of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> have had that [have been] before וְאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> thee neither shall there any after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon לַבָּמָ֤ה <S%H1116><s%> [from his journey] to the high place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בְּגִבְעוֹן֙ <S%H1391><s%> that [was] at Gibeon יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel פ

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <S%H622><s%> gathered שְׁלֹמֹה֮ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וּפָרָשִׁים֒ <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֗וֹ אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> and he had a thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וּשְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וַיַּנִּיחֵם֙ <S%H3240><s%> which he placed בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> in the chariot וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and with the king בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> made הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֧סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem כָּאֲבָנִ֑ים <S%H68><s%> [as plenteous] as stones וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הָאֲרָזִ֗ים <S%H730><s%> and cedar trees נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> made כַּשִּׁקְמִ֥ים <S%H8256><s%> he as the sycomore trees אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> it בַּשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <S%H8219><s%> that [are] in the vale לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for abundance

וּמוֹצָ֧א <S%H4161><s%> brought הַסּוּסִ֛ים <S%H5483><s%> had horses אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לִשְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וּמִקְוֵ֕א <S%H4723><s%> and linen yarn סֹחֲרֵ֣י <S%H5503><s%> merchants הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's מִקְוֵ֥א <S%H4723><s%> the linen yarn יִקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> received בִּמְחִֽיר׃ <S%H4242><s%> at a price

וַֽ֠יַּעֲלוּ <S%H5927><s%> And they fetched up וַיּוֹצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and brought forth מִמִּצְרַ֤יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt מֶרְכָּבָה֙ <S%H4818><s%> a chariot בְּשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> for six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver וְס֖וּס <S%H5483><s%> and an horse בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמֵאָ֑ה <S%H3967><s%> for an hundred וְ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> the same לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מַלְכֵ֧י <S%H4428><s%> [horses] for all the kings הַֽחִתִּ֛ים <S%H2850><s%> of the Hittites וּמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and for the kings אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria בְּיָדָ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> by their means יוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> and so brought they out
